headline: Inflation Report Helps ‘Defensively Positioned’ Auto Insurers: Heard on the Street
summary: Auto insurers are arguably one group of companies that didn’t get a tariff reprieve on Wednesday since import levies are still on track for autos and, soon, auto parts.  That could drive up claims costs.

headline: The Progressive Corporation (PGR): One of the Best Insurance Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds
summary: We recently published a list of the 10 Best Insurance Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds.
